definitions.definition: A medical student's session spent in a real-world nursing environment.
Of or pertaining to a medical clinic or facility.
definitions.example: Medicine is now more often practiced in a clinical setting than in the home.

definitions.definition: Dealing with practical management of patients; contrasting with prehealth sciences.
Of or relating to a bed.
definitions.example: a clinical convert: one who turns to religion on their death-bed
